releaseNotes:
- Enhancements for TV remote support, Custom Loading/Shimmer, and Player Fixes, and many more...

Team Netra

changelog.text: Added custom Lottie loading animations and shimmer effects for better UI feedback.
Resolved player crash on Xiaomi/MTK devices by filtering buggy secure decoders.
Fixed TV remote navigation and crashes by updating focus handling and XML drawables.
Enabled playback for M3U8 playlists without extensions and fixed extractor logic.
Solved 'See All' blank screen issue on TV by forcing UI updates on data initialization.

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
